headline: Applied Materials, KLA Corporation, Lam Research, Seagate Technology, and Western Digital Stocks Trade Down, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the morning session after a broader market rotation out of the technology sector led to profit-taking following a recent rally.

headline: Stock Indexes Pressured by Tech Weakness

headline: LRCX vs. TSM: Which Semiconductor Powerhouse Is the Better Buy?
